post.text:
Q: "Who are you consulting with consistently so that you're ready on day one?"
Trump: "I'm speaking with myself...because I have a very good brain."

comment.author: Kayla
comment.text: So trump is for human trafficking? That's like saying I'm for oxygen. You are so out of touch with the real issues it's not even funny. And your a liar you belong in jail. #HillaryforPrison2016

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: They are referring to trump and the 13 year old girl he molested. Now how belongs in jail You should join him

replies.author: Kaitlin
replies.text: Yeah, the ad never said anything like that. Comprehension not your strong suit, huh? HAHAHA It is never too late to go back to school. Make your Momma proud and go learn something.

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: Kaitlin please don't vote, she's saying she isn't for human trafficking lol who is? She has implication behind it. Don't be a sheep please. Haha
